SELECT p.performance_id, s.student_id, p.lesson_id, p.score, p.reason, p.teacher_id, p.create_time, p.update_time, u.nick_name AS student_name, s.student_no, s.class_code, s.entry_year FROM biz_student s LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN biz_classroom_performance p ON s.student_id = p.student_id AND p.lesson_id = #{lessonId} WHERE s.class_code = #{classCode} AND s.entry_year = #{entryYear} ORDER BY s.student_no

mapper.update: UPDATE biz_classroom_performance SET score = #{score}, reason = #{reason}, update_time = NOW() WHERE performance_id = #{performanceId}
